review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CÃ³ GiÆ°á»ng Cá»¡ King
review.comment_positive: Vila Basi is certainly not luxurious but it is exactly as advertised - a series of little bungalows in a lovely garden with lots of fun animals. The staff is fantastic - very helpful. They have excellent bicycles (free) that you can use to get into town and the temple and pond there and they arranged a little tour to the farther away temples. They made us noodle soup for breakfast for a small extra charge. They also arranged onward bus tickets and took us to the bus stop. Highly recommended.

The property has a nice garden, and is perfect for cats and dogs lovers !
It is possible to rent a motorbike to drive around

Tita and the staff speak goof English and assisted me well in booking a bus to my next destination, and taking me to the bus stop (it can be quite difficult to do this alone as local bus tickets must be booked on the phone and bus drivers/assistant don't speak English)

The room and bathroom equipments are basic, with low water pressure and not much hot water

review.comment_positive: Beautiful surrounding garden area, lots of plants and very pretty rice fields. The room was spacious, clean and relaxing. On arrival after a long and sweaty bicycle trip, I was greeted with ice tea and bananas. Room has AC and a fan. The lady was very very kind and insisted she pumped up the tyres on my bike for me despite me insisting I do it myself. A short bike ride to the town, lots of beautiful temples to visit
